title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. Consider the following aspects: 1) Sensor data acquisition and preprocessing, 2) Data storage and management, 3) Machine learning model training and deployment, 4) Monitoring and alerting mechanisms, 5) User interface and visualization, 6) Scalability and fault tolerance, 7) Security and access control, 8) Integration with existing systems (if any), 9) Deployment and maintenance strategies.

title: Fiber Optic Sensor Integration
description: Research and select appropriate fiber optic sensors for pipeline monitoring. Define sensor deployment strategy.

title: Data Acquisition and Processing
description: Design and implement data acquisition and processing components for sensor data.

title: Machine Learning Model Development
description: Research and develop machine learning models for pipeline integrity prediction and failure detection.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design and implement the user interface for monitoring and reporting.

title: Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement data storage and management solutions for sensor data and analysis results.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms for the system.

title: System Integration and Testing
description: Integrate all components and perform comprehensive system testing.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the system to production environments and implement monitoring and maintenance processes.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and provide training for system users and administrators.
